subject: Hockey, Ice
Theater
lead_paragraph: The Coyotes, the Canucks and the Flames took up residency in the metropolitan area over the past two weeks but did more than visit the Devils, the Islanders and the Rangers.
snippet: The Coyotes, the Canucks and the Flames took up residency in the metropolitan area over the past two weeks but did more than visit the Devils, the Islanders and the Rangers.
